attributes.action: Make Sesame Street's Bert and Ernie Lords in the house of lords
attributes.additional_details: I think Bert and Ernie would make excellent Lords in the house of lords please make it happen
attributes.background: I am petitioning to make Sesame street's Bert and Ernie Lords in the house of lords

rejection.details: We think you started this petition as a joke. The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.
